dashboard.label: Azure L32s V2 vs Azure L32s V3
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_EpooDQEv":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_37Cb1Dv9"},"title":"Times by Platform, Search Type and Cached vs Uncached","options":{"dataValuesDisplay":"all","seriesColorsByField":{"aws":"#f09e38","azure":"#3078cd"},"xAxisLabelRotation":45}},"viz_BxRzgdtu":{"type":"splunk.column","options":{"dataValuesDisplay":"all","yAxisTitleText":"seconds","yAxisLabelVisibility":"show","seriesColorsByField":{"cached":"#00CDAF","uncached":"#dc4e41"}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GIhocW20"},"title":"Uncached vs Cached by Platform"}},"dataSources":{"ds_37Cb1Dv9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| `aws-vs-azure`
| map maxsearches=100 search=" | inputlookup $$title$$ append=true | eval sname=$$title$$"
| eval io_limit=if( like( sname, "%azure%" ), "azure", "aws" )
| fields - _raw 
| search search_name !="dense*"
| eval runDuration = round(runDuration,1), eventsScannedPerSec=round((scanCount / exact(runDuration)),1)
| eval test_name=search_name+"_"+cached
| table sid,runDuration,test_name,io_limit,search_name,cached,search.index.bucketcache.miss.duration_secs,search.index.bucketcache.hit.invocations,search.index.bucketcache.miss.invocations,searchTotalBucketsCount,searchTotalBucketsCount, eventsScannedPerSec
| sort search_type,- cached,io_limit
| chart max(runDuration) over test_name by io_limit"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_GIhocW20":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| `aws-vs-azure`
| map maxsearches=100 search="| inputlookup $$title$$ append=true | eval sname=$$title$$" 
| eval io_limit=if( like( sname, "%azure%" ), "azure", "aws" )
| fields - _raw 
| search search_name !="dense*"
| eval runDuration = round(runDuration,1), eventsScannedPerSec=round((scanCount / exact(runDuration)),1) 
| eval test_name=search_name+"_"+cached,published2=strptime(published, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| eval finished=strftime((published2+runDuration),"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| table published,runDuration,finished,search_name,test_name,cached,sname,secondInterval,io_limit 
| stats min(published) as min_time ,max(finished) as max_time,first(io_limit) as io_limit by sname,cached 
| eval min_t = strptime(min_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval max_t = strptime(max_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval diff = tostring((max_t - min_t), "duration") 
| eval duration=strptime(diff,"%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval base=strptime("00:00:00.00","%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval secs=duration-base 
| chart max(secs) as seconds by io_limit,cached"},"name":"Search_2"},"ds_oN06mecf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| `test-lookups`
| map maxsearches=100 search="| inputlookup $$title$$ append=true | eval sname=$$title$$" 
| eval io_limit=if( like( sname, "%azure%" ), "azure", "aws" )
| eval cached=if( cached="true", "cached", "uncached" )
| fields - _raw 
| search search_name !="dense*" AND search_name="rare*"
| eval runDuration = round(runDuration,1), eventsScannedPerSec=round((scanCount / exact(runDuration)),1) 
| eval test_name=search_name+"_"+cached,published2=strptime(published, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| eval finished=strftime((published2+runDuration),"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| table published,runDuration,finished,search_name,test_name,cached,sname,secondInterval,io_limit 
| stats min(published) as min_time ,max(finished) as max_time,first(io_limit) as io_limit,first(cached) as cached by sname 
| eval min_t = strptime(min_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval max_t = strptime(max_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval diff = tostring((max_t - min_t), "duration") 
| eval duration=strptime(diff,"%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval base=strptime("00:00:00.00","%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval secs=duration-base 
| stats max(secs) as seconds by io_limit,cached
| sort io_limit,- cached
| autoregress io_limit as prev_io_limit
| autoregress seconds as prev_seconds
| eval diff_factor=if(io_limit=prev_io_limit,round((prev_seconds/seconds),1),0)
| fields - prev_io_limit, prev_seconds
| stats max(seconds) as seconds ,max(diff_factor) as diff_factor by io_limit,cached"},"name":"Search_3"},"ds_Pt0SLvel_ds_oN06mecf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| `aws-vs-azure`
| map maxsearches=100 search="| inputlookup $$title$$ append=true | eval sname=$$title$$" 
| eval io_limit=if( like( sname, "%azure%" ), "azure", "aws" )
| fields - _raw 
| search search_name !="dense*" 
| eval runDuration = round(runDuration,1), eventsScannedPerSec=round((scanCount / exact(runDuration)),1) 
| eval test_name=search_name+"_"+cached,published2=strptime(published, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| eval finished=strftime((published2+runDuration),"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N") 
| table published,runDuration,finished,search_name,test_name,cached,sname,secondInterval,io_limit 
| stats min(published) as min_time ,max(finished) as max_time,first(io_limit) as io_limit,first(cached) as cached by sname 
| eval min_t = strptime(min_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval max_t = strptime(max_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") 
| eval diff = tostring((max_t - min_t), "duration") 
| eval duration=strptime(diff,"%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval base=strptime("00:00:00.00","%H:%M:%S.%2N") 
| eval secs=duration-base 
| stats max(secs) as seconds by io_limit,cached
| sort io_limit,-cached
| autoregress io_limit as prev_io_limit
| autoregress seconds as prev_seconds
| eval diff_factor=if(io_limit=prev_io_limit,round((prev_seconds/seconds),1),0)
| fields - prev_io_limit, prev_seconds
| stats max(diff_factor) as diff_factor by io_limit,cached"},"name":"Search_3 copy 1"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"0,"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{"width":1440,"height":960},"structure":[{"item":"viz_EpooDQEv","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1440,"h":400}},{"item":"viz_BxRzgdtu","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":400,"w":1440,"h":276}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"description":"","title":"Azure L32s V2 vs Azure L32s V3"}
